nodes.text: Zoochberries were a type of berry that could be grown on several worlds and used in many recipes. At some point, the berry lost its popularity, resulting in few farmers continuing to grow it. The stunted supply of zoochberries led to a steep hike in their price. By the time of the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY the Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs had created the dessert Zoochberry Surprise. The treat tasted like zoochberries despite not having any within it.

Zoochberries were first mentioned in the canon 2019 recipe book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which was authored by Chelsea Monroe-Cassel and Marc Sumerak. Within the Star Wars Legends continuity, zoochberries were first introduced in The Glove of Darth Vader, a 1992 novel written by Paul and Hollace Davids.
